snippet: What is vegetarianism? Veganism? Why are many drawn to these diets? Is it healthy to avoid meat? In this lesson, students create vegetarian menus for fictional characters, then analyze them for nutritional content.
abstract: What is vegetarianism? Veganism? Why are many drawn to these diets? Is it healthy to avoid meat? In this lesson, students create vegetarian menus for fictional characters, then analyze them for nutritional content.

byline.original: By ALISON FROMME and MICHAEL GONCHAR

headline.main: Minus the Meat: Analyzing and Creating Healthy Vegetarian Meals
